html:
For today only B&H Photo has on sale the Legende Series 1 Carbon Fiber Travel Tripod Kit for only $569.99, saving you $430!

Legende Series 1 Carbon Fiber Travel Tripod Kit

  • Load Capacity: 17.6 lb
  • Maximum Height: 65″
  • Minimum Height: 16.9″
  • Reverse-Folded Length: 16.9″
  • Weight: 3.2 lb
  • Ball Head with Arca-Type QR and Plate
  • 4-Section Carbon Fiber Legs, Twist Locks
  • Leather Carrying Strap
  • With Mini Traveler Tabletop Tripod V1
  • Includes Legende Camera Backpack

The Legende Series 1 Carbon Fiber Travel Tripod Kit from Gitzo is comprised of the special edition Series 1 4-section Traveler tripod with specially-designed matte silver aluminum center ball head, this kit is built for discerning, globe-trotting photographers who likes to travel light. This leg and head combination has a load capacity of 17.6 lb and is recommended for use with lenses up to 200mm. Two locking leg angles and an included short center column segment allow the tripod to get down for low-angle or macro shots.

The Series 1 Traveler carbon fiber tripod is ultracompact, with legs constructed from Carbon eXact tubing for superior strength and rigidity in a slim silhouette. The aluminum rock ring twist lock joints are artfully crafted for this model. The 180° leg system enables the legs to reverse-fold around the center column and head, allowing it to collapse down to 19.9″. This lightweight tripod weighs a mere 3.2 lb, and the included Eco-leather shoulder strap ensures comfortable carrying.

  • Arca-type head with tension adjustment and independent pan lock
  • Independent leg spread with 2 leg angles
  • Reverse-folding legs for transport and storage
  • Short column included for ground-level shooting
  • Eco-leather shoulder strap for easy, comfortable carrying
  • Mini Traveler tabletop tripod V1
  • Legende 14L camera backpack

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
